derivation: middle voice from a compound of G575 (ἀπολογέομαι) and G3056 (ἀπολογέομαι);
kjv_def: answer (for self), make defence, excuse (self), speak for self
strongs_def: to give an account (legal plea) of oneself, i.e. exculpate (self)
outline:
1. to defend one's self, make one's defence
  2. to defend a person or a thing
  3. to give a full account of
    1. to calculate or consider well
